Index.title: Weekly Report Generator
Index.description2: Help you generate a full weekly report
Index.slogan: Getting a headache when you write your weekly report? Let me help you!
Index.step1: Briefly describe what you have done
Index.placeholder: For example: fixed the bug that coupons could not be collected, designed UI and icons for the new app of the product department, responsible for following up the recruitment of front-end engineers in the department
Index.step2: Select the form of the output result.
Index.privacyPolicy1: Please do not upload work that is too private, check out the
Index.paragraphFormPrompt:
Please summarise the chat between <|start|> and <|end|>. It is required to be concise and output in a paragraph.

<|start|>
Index.prompt: Please help me populate the following work as a full weekly report and output in Markdwown format as a point-by-point narrative:
Index.outlineFormPrompt:
Please summarise the chat between <|start|> and <|end|>. It should be concise and output as an outline containing a list.

<|start|>
Index.notice: As a result the number of users of the site has skyrocketed at an incredible rate, and the authors cannot afford the ensuing operating costs, so it has been decided that this site will be taken offline permanently on 2023-02-15 00:00:00.
